name: Lichess — Blindfold level 3
description: Inspired by chesstempo. Third level of blindfold pieces. All pieces look the same. One color.
css:
@-moz-document domain("lichess.org")
{
  piece.pawn.black,
  piece.knight.black,
  piece.bishop.black,
  piece.rook.black,
  piece.queen.black,
  piece.king.black,
  piece.pawn.white,
  piece.knight.white,
  piece.bishop.white,
  piece.rook.white,
  piece.queen.white,
  piece.king.white

  {
    background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)!important;
  }  
  
}
